snippet.title: Get this satisfying image crusher... for $0.00! (Steam trailer)
snippet.description:
Mossy Pixels is coming to Steam on December 4th! 🥳
• More info: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2618370/Mossy_Pixels/

•  My Games: https://www.khud0.com/
•  Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Khud0

•  Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/Khud0
•  Discord: https://discord.gg/NMe8DcU
•  Twitter: https://twitter.com/Khud0Games

• Music: https://twitter.com/hyp3rsleep

Hey, welcome back to the Khud0 - Indie Game Dev channel!

Meet Mossy Pixels: a 100% free point & click game, the main purpose of which is to help you wind down, relax, and enjoy the moment. Soon you'll be able to get this satisfying image crusher... for $0.00! 

Is it going to be one of the best free games on Steam? Probably not, but I hope that it will at least make one of your evenings a little bit brighter. ^^

Whether you're an indie game developer yourself, or you're interested in games made with Unity for some other reason, I'm looking forward to seeing you in my next devlog! Make sure to subscribe so that you don't miss it. ;)
